Emma Wilson

Researcher

Home Research Resources

Research interests

Previously, I have worked on systematic reviews of experimental neuroscience research. My current interests are:

  • community-led open research initiatives
  • open-source infrastructures for knowledge dissemination and information retrieval
  • critical disability studies perspectives on neuroscience (especially neurodivergent experiences)
